Parameters: String: Can be any of @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#MULTIPLICITY_SINGLE_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#MULTIPLICITY_DUAL_E@ and @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#MULTIPLICITY_PLURAL_E@.
setMultiplicity(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the multiplicity information for this instance.

Parameters: String: Can be any of @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ANIMACY_ANIMATE_E@ and @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#ANIMACY_INANIMATE_E@.
setAnimacy(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the animacy information for this instance.

Parameters: String: Can be any of @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_NOMINATIVE_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_ACCUSATIVE_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_DATIVE_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_ABLATIVE_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_GENITIVE_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_VOCATIVE_E@, @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_LOCATIVE_E@ and @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CASE_INSTRUMENTAL_E@.
setCase(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the grammatical case information for this instance.

setGender(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the gender information for this instance.

ClassDesc: A builder for TtsSpans, has setters for morphosyntactic features. This builder can be used directly, but the more specific subclasses of this builder like @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#TextBuilder_E@ and @B_android#text#style#TtsSpan#CardinalBuilder_E@ are likely more useful.
